docs.title: OSINT Toolkit
docs.text:
Welcome to your personal, searchable Open Source Intelligence resource hub.

Use the search bar at the top to find a specific tool instantly, or browse the categories below to explore the toolkit.

docs.title: Tool Categories
docs.text:
• 🗺️ Geospatial & Maps Tools for maps, satellite imagery, location finding, and geographic data.

  • 👥 Social Media Intelligence (SOCMINT) Tools specifically designed for searching and analyzing social media platforms.

  • 📸 Image & Video Analysis Reverse image search, metadata (EXIF) viewers, and video forensics.

  • 🌐 Domain & IP Intelligence WHOIS lookups, DNS records, website technology, and certificate information.

  • 👤 People Search & Usernames Tools for finding information on individuals and checking usernames.

  • ✈️ Transportation Tracking Resources for tracking aircraft and maritime vessels.

  • 📰 News & Event Monitoring Live conflict maps, news aggregators, and trend trackers.

  • 🕵️ Dark Web & Anonymity Networks Tools and resources for investigating anonymity networks like Tor.

  • 📖 Verification & Resources Handbooks, checklists, blogs, tutorials, and essential OSINT collections.

  • 🔧 Browser Extensions & Utilities Plugins and general-purpose tools that assist in the OSINT workflow.

docs.title: 🕵️ Dark Web & Anonymity Networks
docs.text: A collection of tools, search engines, and resources for investigating and understanding anonymity networks like Tor, I2P, and the content they host.

docs.title: Anonymity Networks & Platforms
docs.text:
Core projects for anonymous communication and browsing.

Name URL Description The Tor Project torproject.org The official website for the Tor anonymity network I2P Network geti2p.net An anonymous network layer (Invisible Internet Project) Freenet freenetproject.org A peer-to-peer platform for censorship-resistant communication Zeronet zeronet.io Decentralized, peer-to-peer web-like network Lokinet lokinet.org An anonymous, decentralized networking layer GNUnet gnunet.org A framework for secure peer-to-peer networking Yggdrasil yggdrasil-network.github.io An end-to-end encrypted IPv6 network

docs.title: Dark Web Search Engines
docs.text:
Search engines for finding content on anonymity networks. Note: Most .onion links require the Tor Browser to access.

Name URL Type Description Ahmia ahmia.fi Clearnet Search engine for Tor hidden services Darksearch darksearch.io Clearnet Search engine for the dark web OnionLand Search onionlandsearchengine.com Clearnet Search engine for .onion sites Tor66 tor66sewebgixwhcqfnp5inzp5x5uohhdy3kvtnyfxc2e5mxiuh34iid.onion .onion Popular search engine on the Tor network Torch xmh57jrknzkhv6y3ls3ubitzfqnkrwxhopf5aygthi7d6rplyvk3noyd.onion .onion One of the oldest search engines on Tor Haystak haystakvxad7wbk5.onion .onion Search engine for Tor hidden services Recon reconponydonugup.onion .onion Search engine primarily for darknet marketplaces I2p Search i2psearch.com Clearnet Search engine for the I2P network

docs.title: Analysis & Investigation Tools
docs.text:
Tools for analyzing hidden services, addresses, and other network data.

Name URL Type Description OnionScan onionscan.org Web Tool Tool for investigating the operational security of Tor hidden services Dark Tracer darktracer.io Web Tool Dark web intelligence platform that can trace onion addresses TorWhois torwhois.com Web Tool A WHOIS-like service for .onion addresses ExoneraTor exonerator.torproject.org Web Tool Tool to check if an IP address was a Tor relay on a given date Deep-Explorer GitHub GitHub Web crawler for the deep and dark web TorBot GitHub GitHub Dark web OSINT tool OSINT.party Garlic osint.party Web Tool Research project analyzing metadata from Tor sites ZoomEye zoomeye.org Web Tool Cyberspace search engine that can sometimes find servers hosting hidden services

docs.title: Breach Data & Doxxing
docs.text:
Services for searching data from security breaches, which are often traded on the dark web.

Name URL Description Have I Been Pwned? haveibeenpwned.com Check if your email or phone is in a data breach DeHashed dehashed.com Breached database search engine for security analysts BreachDirectory breachdirectory.org Large repository of breached data Cit0day Email Lookup breach.myosint.com Lookup tool for the massive Cit0day breach Doxbin doxbin.org Document sharing website known for publishing personal information

docs.title: PGP & Encryption
docs.text:
Tools and resources related to PGP, an encryption standard vital for dark web communications.

Name URL Description MIT PGP Key Server pgp.mit.edu Public server for finding PGP keys Keybase keybase.io Service for managing online identities and encrypted communication PGP Global Directory keyserver.pgp.com Global directory for PGP keys PGP Tutorial for Beginners pitt.edu Guide to understanding and using PGP

docs.title: Link Lists & Marketplaces
docs.text:
Websites that aggregate links to active .onion sites, marketplaces, and other resources.

Name URL Description Dark Fail dark.fail Checks which darknet sites are online and provides verified links Hidden Services Today hidden-services.today List of active hidden services DNStats dnstats.net Darknet market status and uptime checker r/onions (Reddit) reddit.com/r/onions Subreddit for discussing and sharing .onion sites

docs.title: Learning & Resources
docs.text:
Tutorials, research papers, and articles about dark web OSINT and security.

Name URL Type Description Dark Web Searching osintcombine.com Article How to approach dark web searching Don't Hesitate, Isolate (Your Virtual Machine) osintcurio.us Article OSINTCurio guide on VM OPSEC How Does Tor Really Work? skerritt.blog Article Detailed visual guide to the Tor network Dark Web Resources sites.google.com Google Site Collection of dark web resources Dark Web Academy darkwebacademy.com Website Learning resources for dark web investigations Onion Routing - Computerphile YouTube Video Video explanation of how onion routing works Darknet Market Archives (2013-2015) gwern.net Archive Archive of darknet market data for research

docs.title: 🌐 Domain & IP Intelligence
docs.text:
Resources for looking up domain registration data (WHOIS), DNS records, IP addresses, and website technology.

  • Whois.com - Standard WHOIS lookup for domain registration data.
  • Whoisology - Historical WHOIS data and registrant connections.
  • ViewDNS.info - A comprehensive suite of DNS and IP tools.
  • SecurityTrails - Extensive current and historical DNS and domain data.
  • SpyOnWeb - Find websites owned by the same person (via AdSense, Google Analytics).
  • crt.sh - Search for SSL/TLS certificates issued for a domain to find subdomains.
  • Wigle - A global database of wireless networks, searchable by map.
  • Cellidfinder - Find coordinates for GSM base stations.
  • IPinfo.io Map - Visualize the location of IP addresses on a map.

docs.title: 🔧 Browser Extensions & Utilities
docs.text:
Browser plugins and general-purpose tools that assist in the OSINT workflow, from capturing information to enhancing search capabilities.

  • RevEye Reverse Image Search - Quickly search an image on multiple reverse image search engines.
  • Wayback Machine - Check for archived versions of any page.
  • Map Switcher - Instantly switch between different map providers for the same location.
  • CrowdTangle Link Checker - See who has shared a link across social media.
  • Fireshot - Capture full webpage screenshots.
  • Hunch.ly - A premium OSINT extension for capturing, documenting, and organizing your investigation.
  • Treeverse - A tool for visualizing and navigating Twitter conversations.
  • Ghostery – Can help identify tracking codes like Google AdSense IDs.

docs.title: 🗺️ Geospatial & Maps
docs.text:
This section contains tools for maps, satellite imagery, location finding, and geographic data analysis.

  • Google Maps - General purpose mapping.
  • Yandex Maps - Strong coverage in Eastern Europe.
  • Baidu Map - Primary mapping service for China.
  • Bing Maps - Includes Bird's Eye view.
  • Wikimapia - Crowdsourced map of places.
  • OpenStreetMap - Open-source, community-driven map data.
  • Mapillary - Street-level imagery platform.
  • KartaView - Open and free street-level imagery.
  • Dual Maps - View two map providers side-by-side.
  • Sentinel Playground - Browser for Sentinel satellite imagery.
  • Google Earth - 3D representation of Earth based on satellite imagery.
  • Zoom.earth - Displays live weather satellite images and storm history.
  • SunCalc - Shows sun movement and sunlight phases for shadow analysis.
  • PeakFinder - Identifies mountains and peaks with a panoramic view.
  • Wayback Imagery - Archive of historical satellite imagery from Esri.
  • Descartes Labs: Search - Searchable satellite imagery platform.
  • Tencent Maps (China) - A major mapping service in China.
  • Amap (China) - Chinese mapping service with street view pictures.
  • HERE WeGo - Satellite - Global mapping service with multiple data layers.

docs.title: 📸 Image & Video Analysis
docs.text:
Tools for reverse image searching, viewing metadata (EXIF), forensic analysis, and interacting with video content.

  • Google Images - Reverse image search.
  • Yandex Images - Excellent reverse image search, especially for faces and locations.
  • Baidu Images - Chinese reverse image search engine.
  • Bing Images - Reverse image search from Microsoft.
  • TinEye - The original reverse image search, good for finding a source and modifications.
  • Google Lens - Uses AI to identify objects and text in images.
  • Pimeyes - A powerful facial recognition search engine.
  • Jeffrey Friedl's Image Metadata Viewer - In-depth EXIF and metadata viewer.
  • FotoForensics - Provides Error Level Analysis (ELA) to detect image manipulation.
  • Forensically - A set of free tools for digital image forensics.
  • InVID Video Verification Plugin - A browser extension for analyzing and verifying video content.
  • Amnesty YouTube DataViewer - Extracts metadata and thumbnails from YouTube videos for verification.
  • WatchFrameByFrame - Analyze YouTube videos frame by frame.
  • FDownloader - Download videos from Facebook.

docs.title: 📰 News & Event Monitoring
docs.text:
Tools for monitoring breaking news, tracking conflicts, and analyzing trends.

  • Liveuamap - Interactive live map of conflict and news events.
  • Syriancivilwarmap.com - A dedicated live map for the Syrian civil war.
  • Google Trends - Analyze the popularity of search queries in Google Search.
  • Google Alerts - Get email notifications for new results on a topic.
  • ReliefWeb - A humanitarian information service provided by the UN.
  • Amnesty News - News and reports from Amnesty International.
  • NewsBrief - European Media Monitor news aggregator.

docs.title: 👤 People Search & Usernames
docs.text:
Tools for finding information on individuals, checking for username availability across platforms, and searching public records.

  • WhatsMyName.app - Checks for a username across hundreds of sites.
  • KnowEm - Searches for usernames on social networks and domains.
  • Namechk - Checks for username and domain name availability.
  • Have I Been Pwned? - Check if an email address or phone number has been in a data breach.
  • Pipl - A deep search engine for people's profiles (paid).
  • PeekYou - People search engine that indexes links to public social pages.
  • Whitepages - Find people, phone numbers, and addresses in the US.
  • Epieos Google Account Tool - Find a Google Account ID and other info from a Gmail address.

docs.title: 👥 Social Media Intelligence (SOCMINT)
docs.text:
These are tools specifically designed for searching, analyzing, and extracting data from social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, and more.

  • Tweetdeck - Advanced Twitter dashboard for monitoring multiple timelines.
  • Twitter Advanced Search - Twitter's native advanced search interface.
  • Crowdtangle - Facebook-owned tool for tracking public content across social media.
  • Reddit User Analyser - Analyze a Reddit user's post history and statistics.
  • Reddit Search (Camas.unddit.com) - An advanced search tool for Reddit comments and posts.
  • SnapMap - View public snaps submitted from locations around the world.
  • Disboard - A search engine for finding Discord servers.
  • StorySaver.net - Download Instagram stories anonymously.
  • SnapTik - Download TikTok videos without watermarks.
  • IntelligenceX (Telegram Search) - Search tool for Telegram content indexed by Intelligence X.
  • TelepathyDB (Beta) - Telegram OSINT database.
  • TGstat - Search and statistics for Telegram channels.
  • Twxplorer - A tool for making sense of Twitter search results by topic.
  • WhoPostedWhat - A non-public tool for searching Facebook by keywords and dates.
  • FDownloader - Download videos from Facebook.

docs.title: ✈️ Transportation Tracking
docs.text:
Resources for live tracking of aircraft and maritime vessels, as well as accessing transportation databases.

  • Flightradar24 - Live commercial flight tracking.
  • FlightAware - Flight tracking with historical data and alerts.
  • ADS-B Exchange - Unfiltered flight data, including military and private aircraft.
  • The OpenSky Network - Global community-based receiver network for flight data.
  • VesselFinder - Real-time ship tracking data with vessel information.
  • MarineTraffic - Live maritime vessel tracking and port data.
  • myShipTracking - Live AIS vessel tracking.
  • FleetMon - Vessel tracking, port information, and maritime news.
  • OpenRailwayMap - A detailed map of the world's railway infrastructure.

docs.title: 📖 Verification & Resources
docs.text:
Handbooks, checklists, blogs, tutorials, and essential OSINT resource collections that form the foundation of good practice.

  • Bellingcat's OSINT Toolkit - A curated list of tools and resources.
  • OSINT Framework - A framework for organizing OSINT tools by category.
  • Verification Handbook - The definitive guide for verifying digital content for emergency coverage.
  • Sector035 - High-quality articles and the "Week in OSINT" newsletter.
  • NixIntel - A blog with in-depth OSINT tutorials and techniques.
  • OSINTCurious - A blog and project dedicated to OSINT learning.
  • i-intelligence OSINT Handbook - A comprehensive PDF handbook on OSINT methods.
  • Web Archive - The Wayback Machine for viewing historical versions of websites.
  • Archive.today - An archive site that captures snapshots of web pages.
